title: Online Introduction to Criminology: Experiential Learning-Based Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: An asynchronous online course in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Conduct at least three experiential simulation activities applying criminology theories to real-world cases
Identify core elements of crime prevention policy design with at least 80% accuracy using Importance-Performance Analysis (IPA)
Accurately describe evidence analysis processes with at least 70% precision through virtual reality-based crime scene reconstruction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
